term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A name given to the study or project. Project title should be fewer than 30 words, such as a title of a grant proposal or a publication.
term_example: Study of single cells in the human body

term_description: A detailed description of the project which includes research goals and experimental approach. Project description should be fewer than 300 words, such as an abstract from a grant application or publication.
term_example: This project explores the intricate details of single cells in the human body, focusing on their structure, function, and behaviour. By studying individual cells, it aims to uncover how they contribute to overall health, disease progression, and human biology. This research can provide deeper insights into cellular processes, paving the way for advancements in medical treatments and personalised medicine.

term_description: A citation for the study resource, following a standard format.
term_example: Doe J., et al. (2024). Single Cell Transcriptomic Analysis of Human Liver Cells. Journal of Cellular Biology.

term_description: The date when the study was created or registered.
term_error_message: Date must be in the YYYY-MM-DD format.

term_description: The workflow or protocol followed during the study.
The sorting or visualisation technology used.

Specifies the terms under which the data associated with the study can be used, shared, or reused. It informs users how they may legally reference, distribute, or build upon the study. Common licenses include Creative Commons (e.g., CC BY 4.0), which require attribution to the original authors when the data is cited or reused.
allowed_values: Creative Commons Attribution Share Alike 4.0 International
GNU General Public License v3.0 or later

term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A 16-digit number that uniquely identify researchers.
term_error_message: Value must follow the format XXXX-XXXX-XXXX-XXXX.

term_description: A first name (or given name) is the personal name given to an individual conducting the study.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A last name (or surname) is the family name passed down from one generation to the next for the individual conducting the study.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A unique identifier used to send and receive electronic messages (emails) over the internet.
term_error_message: No consecutive dots or hyphens, must contain '@'.

term_description: An organisation or institution that this person is associated with.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.
A grant that directly or indirectly provides funding or sponsorship for the person to conduct the study.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for the  study if referring to
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sample. This field must provide a consistent, unambiguous way to identify the sample within and across datasets. It can be a name, code, or accession-like format, as long as it remains unique.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: The formal Latin name used to identify the organism from which the sample was derived (e.g. Homo sapiens or Arabidopsis thaliana). This name must accurately correspond to the Taxon ID provided to ensure correct taxonomic classification.
term_error_message: String must start with uppercase and contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: A unique identifier (usually from a recognized taxonomy database like NCBI Taxonomy) that corresponds to the organism’s scientific name. It must be accurately matched to the provided scientificName to maintain consistency and traceability in biological records.
term_error_message: It must be numbers

term_description: A unique identifier assigned to a biological sample after it has been submitted to a public database, such as the NCBI BioSample or ENA. It serves as a permanent reference to that specific sample, allowing researchers to retrieve metadata and link it across studies or datasets.
A unique alphanumeric identifier for this study
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the library preparation protocol used during the sequencing.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sample assigned to the library preparation. This field must provide a consistent, unambiguous way to identify the sample within and across datasets. It can be a name, code, or accession-like format, as long as it remains unique.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: The version number of the library preparation kit used for sequencing.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The method used to amplify the Complementary DNA (cDNA).
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The number of cycles used during the Complementary DNA (cDNA) amplification process.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The average length of RNA fragments in base pairs (BP) after library preparation, indicating the quality and suitability of the RNA for sequencing.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The library construction method (including version) that was used.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The specific fraction of biological macromolecule from which the sequencing library is derived.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The type of primer used for reverse transcription. This allows users to identify content of the cDNA library input for mRNA.
The end from which the molecule was sequenced.
The end bias of the library.
The Complementary DNA (cDNA) strand of the library from which the reads derived from - sense (first), antisense (second), both or none.
External RNA added to the sample as a control to assess technical variability and normalization in RNA-sequencing. State whether spike-in was used.
The specific type of external RNA used for spiking in, often indicating the source or nature of the control RNA.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The final concentration or dilution (for commercial sets) of the spike in mix.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: Barcode sequence used on the i5 adapter during library preparation for identifying samples in multiplexed single-cell RNA-sequencing.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: Barcode sequence used on the i7 adapter to distinguish samples in multiplexed sequencing runs.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: Specifies if both i5 and i7 indices (dual) or only one index (single) was used for sample identification during sequencing.
The nucleotide sequence of the i5 index used in multiplexing during sequencing.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The specific nucleotide sequence of the i7 index used for a sample.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: Identifier for the 96-well plate used in sample preparation.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: The row identifier in a 96-well plate indicating the sample's position.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: The column identifier in a 96-well plate indicating the sample's position.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The cell marker for the Fluorescence-Activated Cell Sorting (FACS) of cells.
The design of the library including details of how it was constructed.
The method used to select for or against, enrich, or screen the material being sequenced.
The type of source material that is being sequenced.
The sequencing technique intended for this library.

term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sequencing protocol.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: The name of the sequencing platform used for the experiment.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: This refers to the machine or platform used for sequencing, with variations in throughput, read lengths, error rates, and application suitability.
term_error_message: String must contain at least one lowercase letter.

term_description: Specify whether to expect single, paired, or other configuration of reads for sequencing
The type of read that contains the Unique Molecular Identifier (UMI) barcode.
The offset in sequence of the Unique Molecular Identifier (UMI) identifying barcode.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The size of the Unique Molecular Identifier (UMI) identifying barcode.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The type of read that contains the UMI barcode.
The offset in sequence of the cell identifying barcode.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The offset in sequence of the cell identifying barcode.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The actual nucleotide sequence obtained from Complementary DNA (cDNA) during sequencing.
The starting position of the Complementary DNA (cDNA) read within the entire sequence, indicating where the read begins after any barcodes or technical sequences.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_description: The size of the Complementary DNA (cDNA) read.
term_error_message: Only positive whole numbers allowed.

term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the library preparation protocol used during the sequencing.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric reference or identifier for the sequencing protocol.
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: A unique alphanumeric identifier for this file
term_error_message: Only letters and numbers allowed. No spaces or special characters.

term_description: The name or accession of the file that contains read 1.
The name or accession of the file that contains read 2.
The name of the file that contains index 1.
The name of the file that contains index 2.
Result of a hash function calculated on the content of the read 1 file  to verify file integrity. Commonly used algorithms include MD5 and SHA-1. The checksums should be separated by a comma (,).
Result of a hash function calculated on the content of the read 2 file  to verify file integrity. Commonly used algorithms include MD5 and SHA-1. The checksums should be separated by a comma (,).

A file containing the known cell barcodes in the
dataset.
